examples.sentence: The pace of high-speed rail development shocked the world.
TikTok videos match the pace of modern attention spans.
Grandma maintains her own pace in square dancing.
The team adjusted their pace to the new project timeline.
Peking Opera performers train for years to master complex paces.
The lion's hunting pace was captured in slow motion.
The panda paced anxiously before giving birth.
He paces like a metronome while brainstorming.
Ancient surveyors paced the Great Wall's length.
She paced out the room before buying furniture.
The CEO paced the stage during the product launch.
Tourists paced the ancient city wall at sunset.
5G technology struggles to keep pace with demand in rural areas.
Shenzhen sets the pace for tech innovation in China.

examples.sentence: The cyclist served as pacemaker for the marathon runners.
She became the academic pacemaker of her generation.
His smart pacemaker syncs data with his Xiaomi watch.
Pacemaker implants now last longer than most smartphones.
The sinoatrial node is the natural pacemaker of the heart.
The 90-year-old still dances with her cardiac pacemaker.
Huawei's 5G patents set the pace for global tech development.
Mariana Trench in the Pacific is deeper than Mount Everest is tall.
Plastic waste has formed a garbage island in the Pacific.
Pacific Rim countries will attend the APEC meeting.
The panda is considered a pacific animal in Chinese culture.
His pacific attitude resolved the neighborhood dispute.
The pacific lake surface mirrored the moonlight.
After the storm came a pacific dawn.
The Pacific Ocean covers one-third of Earth's surface.
UN advocates pacific settlement of international disputes.

examples.sentence: The ancient tea-horse road witnessed countless pacifications between tribes.
Pacification after the watermelon fight involved sharing mooncakes.
The policy of pacification only delayed the inevitable conflict.
His pacification attempts were like putting band-aids on a broken dam.
The pacification of the rebellion took three spicy hotpot banquets.
Qin Shi Huang's pacification campaign unified China's writing system.
The emperor launched a pacification campaign with more dumplings than swords.
The policy of pacification was as effective as using tofu to stop a tank.
Gandhi's pacifism inspired global civil rights movements.
The panda is considered a symbol of pacifism in Chinese culture.
John Lennon's bed-ins became iconic protests of pacifism.
Many poets expressed pacifism through anti-war verses during WWI.
The monk practiced pacifism even when facing aggression.
Quakers are known for their pacifism and refusal to bear arms.
Her militant pacifism led to hunger strikes outside parliament.
The NGO promotes practical pacifism through conflict mediation.
The pacifist refused to join the military, choosing instead to plant trees in conflict zones.
As a lifelong pacifist, she organizes origami crane workshops for children.
The famous pacifist wrote a manifesto using only emojis to spread anti-war messages.
Pacifists staged a 'pillow fight protest' outside the parliament building.
The Buddhist monk is a strict pacifist who responds to insults with meditation.
Pacifists in the war zone developed a 'flower armor' protection method.
The militant pacifist chain herself to the tank with rainbow-colored handcuffs.
The mother pacified the crying baby with a lullaby about dumplings.
Hot pot always pacifies my angry girlfriend better than words.
He pacified his homesick roommate with spicy crayfish.
The teacher pacified the nervous student before the exam with dark humor.
Ancient emperors often used marriage alliances to pacify neighboring tribes.
The policy of pacifying the rebels with money eventually backfired.
The new manager pacified the resistant team with free afternoon naps.
Qin Shi Huang pacified the six states with his Terracotta Army.
Grandmas in China often pacify kids with candy.
The riot was pacified by deploying bubble tea trucks.
The marathon runner's perfect pacing helped conserve energy for the final sprint.
Grandma's pacing in the park is faster than most teenagers!
The express delivery pack contained 5 bags of spicy crayfish.
She received a mystery pack from her online shopping addiction.
A pack of influencers stormed the new milk tea shop.
The wolf pack coordinated like Douyin live-streaming teams.
He always carries a pack of poker cards for magic tricks.
His hiking pack contained instant noodles and a portable charger.
Workers pack mooncakes like assembling iPhones.
She packed her suitcase with 10 cheongsams for the trip.
Commuters pack into subway cars like canned sardines.
We packed up within 3 minutes when the hostel fire alarm rang.
The hotpot restaurant was packed like dumplings during holidays.
The courier threw my taobao package over the fence like a basketball.
Her birthday package contained 5 layers of bubble wrap.
This office package includes a free cloud storage subscription.
Pirated Adobe packages often come with bonus viruses.
They packaged mooncakes in spaceship-shaped boxes this year.
The celebrity packaged his bad temper as 'artistic temperament'.
This package deal includes flights, hotels and Disneyland tickets.
The package tour trapped us in 8 jade shops per day.
Our package tour to Thailand included 3 mandatory gem stores visits.
The government's new economic package includes vouchers for hotpot restaurants.
The packaged mooncakes with rabbit designs sold out instantly.
Avoid buying packaged vegetables wrapped in three layers of plastic.
Pre-packaged hotpot ingredients save time but lack freshness.
The panda-shaped packaging of these mooncakes went viral on Xiaohongshu.
Japanese snack packaging often has tear-open designs for convenience.
Shenzhen's packaging industry supplies 70% of global iPhone boxes.
Sustainable packaging is revolutionizing the bubble tea industry.
The vacuum packaging keeps liangpi fresh for 3 extra days.
Biodegradable packaging is being adopted by hotpot chain stores.
The new packaging design features traditional paper-cutting art.
Mid-Autumn Festival mooncakes are notorious for excessive packaging.
This mooncake is packed with salted egg yolks like a treasure box.
Her speech was packed with internet slangs from Douyin.
The hotpot restaurant was packed within 10 minutes of opening.
Every bullet train during Spring Festival is packed like sardine cans.
The snow on Harbin's roads was packed into ice sheets by countless footsteps.
Traditional zongzi requires packed glutinous rice for better texture.
Commuters in Tokyo subway are packed like sardines during rush hours.
Her packed lunch always contains Szechuan pickles that make coworkers envious.
The packer at the fruit market wraps lychees like a magician.
Amazon packers can prepare 300 boxes per hour during Singles' Day.
The sardine packer wears special gloves to handle fish.
As a pickled vegetable packer, his fingers always smell of garlic.
The automatic packer at SF Express can seal 1 parcel per second.
This rice packer machine fills 5kg bags with 99.9% accuracy.
The packer carefully wrapped my grandma's antique clock.
Beijing packers charge extra during peak moving seasons.
The tea packer supplies leaves to 200 bubble tea shops.
As a fruit packer, he negotiates directly with farmers.
The tuna packer increased production before fishing ban season.
Our mushroom packer just imported German sterilization equipment.
She tore open the red packet and found 666 yuan inside.
The tea packet had a panda design that melted tourists' hearts.
The courier delivered a packet of love letters from the 1980s.
I received a packet of fan mail after my douyin went viral.
That influencer earns a packet from livestreaming snacks.
Spending a packet on bubble tea every month is my guilty pleasure.
Grandma packet homemade chili sauce into 100 tiny jars.
They're packetting mooncakes like assembling iPhones.
In 1840, the first packet boat carried opium and mail between continents.
WeChat messages travel as data packets through fiber optics.
The ancient Tea Horse Road was lined with packhorses carrying pu'er tea.
Modern logistics trucks are like steel packhorses of the 21st century.
Delivery riders work like packhorses during Double 11 shopping festival.
My laptop has become a digital packhorse with all these project files.
The bubble wrap packing for my porcelain teapot survived the delivery.
Her gift had five layers of packing like a Russian nesting doll.
We reused the foam packing from the electronics box as yoga blocks.
The packing peanuts are actually made from cornstarch - you can eat them!
The contract packing included a red wax seal like in ancient times.
Check the packing slip before signing for the delivery.
Her packing for the trip included 3 swimsuits but forgot the charger.
Light packing is an art - I can live for a week with just a backpack.
The Taobao seller included a bilingual packing list with emoji symbols.
I always do the packing last minute while eating instant noodles.

examples.sentence: The landlord and tenant signed a pact with a handshake over hotpot.
Their blood pact was sealed with baijiu shots during the ceremony.
The Panda Pact between zoos ensures genetic diversity of giant pandas.
We made a silent pact to split the last xiaolongbao equally.
The Treaty of Nerchinsk was the first pact between China and Russia.
Climate pacts are like group chats where countries promise to use fewer emojis.
The panda sat on a bamboo pad while eating.
Kneeling pads save your knees when mopping floors.
The calligrapher dipped his seal into the red ink pad.
We found a secret pad through the bamboo forest.
She padded her resume with imaginary internships.
The cat padded silently across the roof.
He padded the expenses report by 30%.
Barefoot kids padded along the riverbank.
The rocket stood ready on the launch pad.
He padded out the speech with unnecessary details.
The panda leaned against the padded wall of its enclosure.

Cats have naturally padded paws for silent hunting.
The camel's padded feet prevent sinking in desert sand.
The psychiatric ward has specially designed padded rooms.
The sofa's memory foam padding molds to your body shape.
Remove the shoulder padding from this jacket for a slimmer look.
His essay contained 30% useful content and 70% meaningless padding.
TV hosts often use laughter as padding during awkward moments.
The actor was caught adding fake massage sessions as padding to his expense report.
Corporate travel budgets often include 15% padding for unexpected costs.

She decorated her paddle with neon stickers for night rowing.
His powerful paddle sent the canoe flying forward.
The steamboat's paddle churned the muddy river water.
We paddled leisurely around the West Lake at sunset.
Children were paddling in the fountain despite the 'No Wading' sign.
Tourists paddled through the shallow stream in waterproof boots.
He paddled the rubber dinghy across the reservoir.
Fishermen paddle tourists to the island for 50 yuan per trip.
The chef paddled the hot pot broth with a wooden spoon.
After graduation, she decided to paddle her own canoe in Shanghai.

examples.sentence: The paddler in yellow rain boots searched for clams at low tide.

Tourists love taking photos with the red-wheeled paddler in Suzhou.

Her hands were covered with paddler's blisters after the marathon.

A kangaroo escaped from the paddock at the wildlife park yesterday.
